name: TheVoiceDeveloper
0:
”Alexa open the voice developer”
”Alexa launch the voice developer”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the voice developer
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hello, I am a voice developer, I specialise in making custom voice apps for smart speakers!

The purpose of this skill is as a mini showcase of the capabilities of your voice assistant. This skill uses features such as:
⭐APL-A for audio layering
⭐Alexa Presentation Language Visuals & Animations
⭐Speech Synthesis Markup
⭐Custom Message in Activity Section of the Amazon Alexa app

So, if you'd like a skill like this one, or have something else in mind then please drop a message to james@thevoicedev.com.

Thanks!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
